## Cookie.expires property

The 'Expires' attribute of the cookie (See [RFC6265 Section 5.2.1](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc6265.html#section-5.2.1)<!-- -->).

**Signature:**

```typescript
expires: Date | 'Infinity' | null;
```
